trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There was one other sighting in Lansing on or around July 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking in the hallway of our house when I looked up at the big windows in the living room, I noticed a triangular shape object with reddish color circular orbs at each end of the Points. I told my husband to look out the window at it and that's when we saw two more Circular orbs under the triangular shape object. We both told each other that we have never seen anything like this. We watched for about six minutes until they just disappeared. This objects made no noise, and would change Color to bright orangish to yellow and back to red. These colors looked like a flames inside the circular objects. And when the two orbs under the triangle would move from right to left it was with very fast speed. We where in all at What we had just seen, and knowing we have never in our lives seen anything like it.
Summary: we saw five objects and three where in a triangle shape, and two others objects where under the triangular shape. And would move with great speed. this lasted for six minutes. Then they just disappeared.
